programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: A heartwarming tale of friendship and love as single mom Maggie adopts a Labrador for her son Ethan.

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A surprise awaits a single mother when she becomes engaged to the son of Santa Claus.

programme.title: A Very English Christmas
programme.desc: Kate plans her English half-sister Harriet’s wedding with the help of Christmas market owner Dylan.

programme.title: A Holiday Homecoming
programme.desc: The residents of Hope, NY come to the aid of displaced foster children after St. Jerome's Home for Children has a fire right before Christmas, and many families find the foster children complete their homes.

programme.title: Fatal Performance
programme.desc: A struggling actress is hired to impersonate a woman for a business meeting, but soon finds her life in danger.

programme.title: Come Dance at My Wedding
programme.desc: A woman faces opposition from her estranged father when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: At Home With Tori
programme.desc: Tori teams up with Million Dollar Matchmaker Patti Stanger to host a series of dates for Morgan, one of her single friends.

programme.title: New Dogs, Old Tricks
programme.desc: Tiny’s bar will close unless he pays $17K; customers rally to save it. Meanwhile, Jay’s hazing alarms.

programme.title: Dance Together
programme.desc: An injured dancer and a shy Deaf girl overcome bullies, disability stigma, and other high school obstacles.

programme.title: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: A cop-turned-writer creates suspicion when she publishes her first novel.

programme.title: The Wedding in the Hamptons
programme.desc: A designer debuts at a Hamptons wedding and is mistaken for a socialite and falls for a groomsman.

programme.title: A Snapshot of Forever
programme.desc: Wedding photographer Jessie's life is changed when a famous Hollywood actor attends her sister's wedding.

programme.title: A Town Called Love
programme.desc: After clashing with the mayor of Love's son Riley, she impersonates her boss to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: Baby Boot Camp
programme.desc: Fitness instructor Julia is down on her luck trying to make her baby boot camp a thriving business. To make ends meet she becomes a part-time nanny for a widower father--although she knows nothing about taking care of children.

programme.title: A Missed Connection
programme.desc: After sparks fly with a woman on a train platform, a photographer posts a missed connection in the newspaper.

programme.title: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Wendy and her daughter head to the city to make enough money to save her father's candy store from closing.
